oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Temperance Election of March 11, 1907, Ladies singing in 8th ward
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: " 44. Ladies singing in Eighth ward." Scenes from Knoxville's Great Temperance Election of March 11th, 1907. Jas. E. Thompson, Photographer. From the Abby Crawford Milton Collection. Shows crowd gathered around a sign 'Waiting for the returns,' Bijou Saloon at right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Political elections; Events; Temperance; Women's rights; Signs (Notices); Flags; Bars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jas. E. Thompson, Knoxville, TN.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
